entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 March 2023
